status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"eqq8v","text":"Clean bench area with 10% bleach, 70% ethanol, and RNase Away","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e0lvo","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"erbnq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"fhr09","text":"Ideally, this should be a designated post-PCR bench area. ","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2h35g","text":"Wipe down 20 µL multichannel pipette and several PCR tube holders with RNase away. Run in UV Crosslinker for 10 minutes on each side. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cjja4","text":"Wipe down ice bin with 10% bleach, 70% ethanol, and RNase Away, fill with ice, and add PCR products stored in 8-strip PCR tubes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"7qb46","text":"Label all 96-well plates needed for storing samples accordingly","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9apjj","text":"Being careful not to open PCR tubes directly over the 96-well plates, add 15 µL of sample to each well using multichannel pipette, making sure you keep track of the orientation of how the plate was filled","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"9q0gs","text":"Seal the plates carefully with aluminum adhesive seals","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"2hjgg","text":"Press around the edges of each well to make sure they are sealed","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9ad20","text":"Wrap each plate in Kimwipes to absorb any condensation that occurs during shipping","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6lbeq","text":"Cut two pieces of cardboard that fit on either side of each plate; tape the cardboard around each plate to form a sandwich (to keep it from getting punctured while shipping)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"2v419","text":"Seal each plate in a new Ziploc bag and label accordingly","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a5vdv","text":"Bubble wrap around each plate and place in a hard container (cardboard freezer box, pipette tip box, etc.)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dfg6n","text":"Seal hard container with tape and place in its own Ziploc bag; label accordingly","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bnl64","text":"Place bagged box in a Styrofoam cooler that fits in an associated cardboard box and fill with ice packs","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"275aq","text":"Tape Styrofoam cooler closed and secure it in the corresponding cardboard box","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eb19b","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"digi5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"e3kkb","text":"If you need to include any order information or documents alongside the samples, don't forget to put them in the box here. ","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"ao2vo","text":"Store cardboard box at -20°C until ready to mail   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Environmental DNA (eDNA) Sample Shipping Protocol
